sqlMap.select: select f_id, f_character_id, f_year, f_week, f_online_time from t_character_week where f_character_id=#fCharacterId# and f_week=#fWeek#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_character_week (f_character_id, f_year, f_week, f_online_time) values (#fCharacterId:INTEGER#, #fYear:INTEGER#, #fWeek:INTEGER#, #fOnlineTime:INTEGER#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: update t_character_week set f_character_id = #fCharacterId:INTEGER#, f_year = #fYear:INTEGER#, f_week = #fWeek:INTEGER#, f_online_time = #fOnlineTime:INTEGER# where f_id = #fId:INTEGER#
